com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader

Class DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader.DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FrontEndAdapter

    public class DataLakeStoreFrontEndAdapterImpl
extends Object
implements FrontEndAdapter
    A front end adapter that communicates with the DataLake Store. This is a syncrhonous call adapter, which has certain efficiency limitations. In the future, new adapters that are created should consider implementing the methods asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • CreateStream

        public void CreateStream(String streamPath,
                         boolean overwrite,
                         byte[] data,
                         int byteCount)
                  throws com.microsoft.azure.CloudException,
                         IOException
        Creates a new, empty stream at the given path.
        Specified by:
        CreateStream in interface FrontEndAdapter
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        overwrite - Whether to overwrite an existing stream.
        data - Optionally pass in data to add to the stream during creation. If null is passed in an empty stream is created
        byteCount - If data is passed in, indicates how many bytes of the data passed in should be pushed into the stream
        Throws:
        com.microsoft.azure.CloudException
        IOException

                         boolean recurse)
                  throws IOException,

        Deletes an existing stream at the given path.
        Specified by:
        DeleteStream in interface FrontEndAdapter
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        recurse - if set to true recursively delete. This is used for folder streams only.
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.microsoft.azure.CloudException

      • AppendToStream

        public void AppendToStream(String streamPath,
                           byte[] data,
                           long offset,
                           int byteCount)
                    throws IOException,
                           com.microsoft.azure.CloudException
        Appends to stream.
        Specified by:
        AppendToStream in interface FrontEndAdapter
        Parameters:
        streamPath - The relative path to the stream.
        data - The data to append to the stream
        offset - This parameter is unused by this implementation, and any value put here is ignored
        byteCount - The number of bytes from the data stream to append (starting at offset 0 of data).
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.microsoft.azure.CloudException

      • Concatenate

        public void Concatenate(String targetStreamPath,
                        String[] inputStreamPaths)
                 throws IOException,
                        com.microsoft.azure.CloudException
        Concatenates the given input streams (in order) into the given target stream. At the end of this operation, input streams will be deleted.
        Specified by:
        Concatenate in interface FrontEndAdapter
        Parameters:
        targetStreamPath - The relative path to the target stream.
        inputStreamPaths - An ordered array of paths to the input streams to concatenate into the target stream.
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.microsoft.azure.CloudException
